content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I am open to hearing your offer. Please remember, we should focus on the rental price only. Any mention of additional responsibilities, lease term conditions, or utility costs will not be considered in this negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. I would like to propose a price of 500 Euro per month for the apartment. Is this acceptable to you?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, Yi-Nuo Wang. However, I am looking for a higher price. Please remember, we should focus on the rental price only. Any mention of additional responsibilities, lease term conditions, or utility costs will not be considered in this negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. How about 550 Euro per month? This would be a fair price for both parties, I believe.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That's a better offer, Yi-Nuo Wang. However, I am still looking for a higher price. Please remember, we should focus on the rental price only. Any mention of additional responsibilities, lease term conditions, or utility costs will not be considered in this negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I respect your position, Mister Schmidt. Let's meet in the middle. How about 575 Euro per month? This would be a fair compromise, in my opinion.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I can see your point, Yi-Nuo Wang. However, I am still looking for a higher price. Please remember, we should focus on the rental price only. Any mention of additional responsibilities, lease term conditions, or utility costs will not be considered in this negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. How about 600 Euro per month? This would be a very good deal for you, considering the location and the new construction.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you for your offer, Yi-Nuo Wang. I accept your offer of 600 Euro per month. Please remember, we should focus on the rental price only. Any mention of additional responsibilities, lease term conditions, or utility costs will not be considered in this negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm glad to hear that, Mister Schmidt. I agree to the price of 600 Euro per month! Please remember, we should focus on the rental price only. Any mention of additional responsibilities, lease term conditions, or utility costs will not be considered in this negotiation.

content: I appreciate the agreement, Yi-Nuo Wang. Let's keep the focus on the rental price only. Any mention of additional responsibilities, lease term conditions, or utility costs will not be considered in this negotiation.
